item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Deep Learning Software Engineer at an Artificial Intelligence startup NovuMind Inc. Before, I was a Software Engineer at IBM Watson and Cloud Platform worked on IBM® Bluemix and SoftLayer®. I worked as Graduate Student Researcher in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of California, Davis, focused on Parallel Computing and GPU Graph Analytics. I also did my summer research internships at DARPA (Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency).
